Parameters: View: The child view that was moved
float: The new offset of this sliding pane within its range, from 0-1
onPanelSlide(android.view.View, float).Description: Called when a sliding pane's position changes.

Parameters: View: The child view that was slid to an open position, revealing other panes
onPanelOpened(android.view.View).Description: Called when a sliding pane becomes slid completely open. The pane may or may not be interactive at this point depending on how much of the pane is visible.

Parameters: View: The child view that was slid to a closed position
onPanelClosed(android.view.View).Description: Called when a sliding pane becomes slid completely closed. The pane is now guaranteed to be interactive. It may now obscure other views in the layout.

ClassDesc: No-op stubs for @B_android#support#v4#widget#SlidingPaneLayout#PanelSlideListener_E@. If you only want to implement a subset of the listener methods you can extend this instead of implement the full interface.
